name: Biological Materials
description: Living biological materials used directly in production, including mycelium cultures, spawn, and genetic stock requiring sterile handling and controlled storage.

name: Filtration & Air Handling
description: Filters and air-handling components used for air quality control in production areas.

name: PPE & Cleanroom
description: Personal protective equipment and sterile-area consumables.

name: Packaging & Logistics
description: Packaging materials used in production, harvest, storage, and shipping.

name: Raw Materials
description: Base materials used for substrate, grain, agar, and liquid culture preparation.

name: Sanitation & Chemicals
description: Chemicals and agents used for cleaning and sanitizing equipment and facilities.

name: Sterilization Supplies
description: Consumables used during sterilization cycles and validation steps.

name: Tools & Equipment
description: Reusable tools, measuring devices, and small equipment items.
